name: Null or deliberate absence of any value
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-1-task-5.png)

Null is a special value that has the meaning of `value intentionally missing`.
Create a variable named `futureProfit` and assign the special value null to it.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
let nextWinner = null;
```
